A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 2/10.  Visually and audio-wise\, this was the best Star Wars movie yet\, and if that was all that mattered this would be a masterpiece.  Unfortunately\, it isn't and this movie is a dumpster fire of missed opportunities\, plot holes\, and social justice bullcrap.\n\nI'd say skip it\, but everyone should see this as a warning of what not to do with a Star Wars movie.
